TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_cimu_a_binacadan, title = cimu_a_binacadan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/cimu_a_binacadan} }

S.FORM: == kakiliman == cimu (Tjimur,Chimo)sa u paywan a binacadan ku namakayniay a bunacadan sa, u nu paywan a binacadan tusaay cayay kalecad a binacadan. 箕模(Tjimur,Chimo) . nipikingkiw nai buyu' sa mabulaw tayda i enal; akay namakay enal taydan i buyu', sanaenelay nai cungyiang abuyu' nu jantu u cacay abinacadan . u lakalak nu cimu a bunacada malakalak i paywan a binacadan, Vuculj matatihepa, aydaay u paywan masasu ala masumad. Vuculj . nilacilan Ukamu sa;yu pulung nu mihcaan cacay a malebut a mihcaan I tawya, cimu a tademaw nai liwkiw malakalak tu malimad tayda i hingcun a subal, nadikudan sa malatusa, cacay taydan i pintung nu layi a buyubuyu'an, dumasa mulakuwit tu kilay a buyu' katukuh i pusung, sadikuday sa u paywan atu piyuma mapulung a maudip kuheni. sakatisa a kamu sa;namakayni i nikingkiwan nu talakaway, nuayawan nu cimu atademaw makayni i kilay a buyu' tatimulen idaw kiya dadipasan nu sauwac, nadikudan sa mabulaw aca tayda i ciyanan a enal, pitung a enal atu liwkiyu a subal a kitidaan, pulung nu mihcaan enem aemang amihcaan namiliyas tuway i taywan, i 2500 amihcaan tayni aca i taywan, milakalak ahebal ku kitidaan, amisan sa i linpan nu sauwac mududuc tu hungkang tatimulen pakay enal nu buyu', mililis tu tu buyubuyu'an idaw ku nadipaan, duma tahina ku taydaay

== kakiliman == cimo (Tjimor,Chimo)sa o paywan a binacadan ko namakayniay a bonacadan sa, o no paywan a binacadan tosaay cayay kalecad a binacadan. 箕模(Tjimor,Chimo) . nipikingkiw nai boyo' sa mabolaw tayda i enal; akay namakay enal taydan i boyo', sanaenelay nai congyiang aboyo' no janto o cacay abinacadan . o lakalak no cimo a bonacada malakalak i paywan a binacadan, Vocolj matatihepa, aydaay o paywan masaso ala masomad. Vocolj . nilacilan Ukamo sa;yo polong no mihcaan cacay a malebot a mihcaan I tawya, cimo a tademaw nai liwkiw malakalak to malimad tayda i hingcon a sobal, nadikodan sa malatosa, cacay taydan i pintong no layi a boyoboyo'an, domasa molakowit to kilay a boyo' katokoh i posong, sadikoday sa o paywan ato piyoma mapolong a maodip koheni. sakatisa a kamo sa;namakayni i nikingkiwan no talakaway, noayawan no cimo atademaw makayni i kilay a boyo' tatimolen idaw kiya dadipasan no saowac, nadikodan sa mabolaw aca tayda i ciyanan a enal, pitong a enal ato liwkiyo a sobal a kitidaan, polong no mihcaan enem aemang amihcaan namiliyas toway i taywan, i 2500 amihcaan tayni aca i taywan, milakalak ahebal ko kitidaan, amisan sa i linpan no saowac mododoc to hongkang tatimolen pakay enal no boyo', mililis to to boyoboyo'an idaw ko nadipaan, doma tahina ko taydaay
